Replies Player: "I'm looking for a way to cross the wall"

Says Persona: "There are no jobs around here. This is why everybody get jobs on the other side!"
Replies Player: "How is it possible to get such a job?"

Says Persona: "You have to get some connections. No connections, no job"
"No idea. I'm too old for that."

Replies Player: "Wait, what kind of connection are you speaking about?"

Says Persona: "Either a contractor living in the surrounding colonies or somebody living on the other side of the wall"
Replies Player: "They can get me a legal job?"

Says Persona: "Not necessaily legal, but at least a job"
Replies Player: "I need to feed my family, we are broke!"

Says Persona: "Get a phone and call [******] on my behalf. He is a contractor"
"Get a phone and call [******] on my behalf. He is a contractor. He could even get you a permit"
"Get a phone and call [******] on my behalf. He might get you a job around here, for some days"
"Oh, and you are looking for the bypass road"
"I understand! Yet I'm not the one who could help you"
"The Red Village between the farm and the wall"
"Not me, but [****] might be able to do it"

Replies Player: "Should I tell him I come on your behalf?"

Says Persona: "You usually help the people you know or the people who know your friends"
